mapper.select:
SELECT
a.orderSeq, a.orderStatus, a.RefundNY, a.OrderDate, a.CardNo, a.CVV, a.CardOwner, a.paymentCD, a.cardCompCD, a.MemberSeq, a.CardDate,
b.memberSeq, b.name, b.email, b.MobileNum,
po.totalPrice,
(SELECT SUM(OrgPrice) FROM productOrdered WHERE ordersSeqF = a.orderSeq) AS totalOrgPrice, (SELECT SUM(OrgPrice - DiscountedPrice) FROM productOrdered WHERE ordersSeqF = a.orderSeq) AS totalDiscountedPrice,
c.recipient, c.zipcode, c.addr, c.addrDetail, c.phoneNum, c.shippingMsg, c.Member_seq
FROM orders a INNER JOIN member b ON a.MemberSeq = b.memberSeq LEFT JOIN (SELECT ordersSeqF, SUM(DiscountedPrice) AS totalPrice FROM productOrdered GROUP BY ordersSeqF) po ON a.orderSeq = po.ordersSeqF LEFT JOIN address c ON a.MemberSeq = c.Member_seq WHERE 1=1 AND a.orderSeq IS NOT NULL

SELECT
a.orderSeq, a.orderStatus, a.RefundNY, a.OrderDate, a.CardNo, a.CVV, a.CardOwner, a.paymentCD, a.cardCompCD, a.MemberSeq, a.CardDate,
b.memberSeq, b.name, b.email, b.MobileNum,
po.totalPrice,
(SELECT SUM(OrgPrice) FROM productOrdered WHERE ordersSeqF = a.orderSeq) AS totalOrgPrice, (SELECT SUM(OrgPrice - DiscountedPrice) FROM productOrdered WHERE ordersSeqF = a.orderSeq) AS totalDiscountedPrice,
c.recipient, c.zipcode, c.addr, c.addrDetail, c.phoneNum, c.shippingMsg, c.Member_seq
FROM orders a INNER JOIN member b ON a.MemberSeq = b.memberSeq LEFT JOIN (SELECT ordersSeqF, SUM(DiscountedPrice) AS totalPrice FROM productOrdered GROUP BY ordersSeqF) po ON a.orderSeq = po.ordersSeqF LEFT JOIN address c ON a.MemberSeq = c.Member_seq WHERE 1=1 AND a.orderSeq = ${orderSeq}

select a.orderSeq, b.productSeqF, b.ea, b.OrgPrice, b.DiscountedPrice, b.size, b.color, b.ordersSeqF, b.productOrderedSeq, c.productSeq, c.ProductName, d.path
from orders a inner join productOrdered b on a.orderSeq = b.ordersSeqF inner join product c on b.productSeqF = c.productSeq inner join prodImg d on b.productSeqF = d.productSeqF where 1=1 and a.orderSeq = #{orderSeq}

select a.memberSeq ,a.ID ,a.name ,b.addrTypeCD ,b.addrDetail ,b.addr ,b.zipcode ,b.recipient ,b.phoneNum ,b.shippingMsg ,b.defaultNY from member a inner join address b on a.memberSeq=b.Member_seq
where 1=1
and a.memberSeq is not null
